Public Class LegendCellCollection Inherits ChartNamedElementCollection(Of LegendCell)

summary.span: 將圖例資料格儲存於 物件。

span.span: Stores legend cells in a object.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Add (System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType cellType, string text, System.Drawing.ContentAlignment alignment);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 Add(valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType cellType, string text, valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment alignment) cil managed
Public Function Add (cellType As LegendCellType, text As String, alignment As ContentAlignment) As Integer
public: int Add(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendCellType cellType, System::String ^ text, System::Drawing::ContentAlignment alignment);

param.name: cellType
param.span: 表示資料格類型的 值。

span.span: A value representing the cell type.

param.name: text
param.span: 表示資料格文字或其影像名稱的 值 (視 cellType 參數的值而定)。

span.span: A value that represents either the cell text or its image name, depending on the value of the cellType parameter.

param.name: alignment
param.span: 表示資料格內容對齊方式的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the cell content alignment.

summary.span: 將具有指定的資料格類型、文字與對齊方式之圖例資料格加入到此集合的結尾。

span.span: Adds a legend cell with the specified cell type, text and alignment to the end of the collection.

returns.span: 值，表示集合中新加入之圖例資料格的索引。

span.span: An value that represents the index of the newly added legend cell in the collection.

.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType cellType, string text, valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment alignment) cil managed
Public Sub Insert (index As Integer, cellType As LegendCellType, text As String, alignment As ContentAlignment)
public: void Insert(int index, System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendCellType cellType, System::String ^ text, System::Drawing::ContentAlignment alignment);

param.name: index
param.span: 要在其中插入物件的位置索引。

span.span: Index of the location to insert the object.

param.name: cellType
param.span: 表示資料格類型的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the cell type.

param.name: text
param.span: 表示資料格文字或其影像名稱的 值 (視 cellType 參數的值而定)。

span.span: A value that represents either the cell text or its image name, depending on the value of the cellType parameter.

param.name: alignment
param.span: 列舉值，表示圖例資料格內容的對齊方式。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the alignment of the legend cell content.

summary.span: 將具有指定的資料格類型、文字與對齊方式之圖例資料格插入到集合中的特定位置。

span.span: Inserts a legend cell with the specified cell type, text and alignment into the collection at a given location.
